verses.name: Luke 15:13
verses.text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together, and took his journey into a far country, and there wasted his substance with riotous living.

verses.name: Luke 15:14
verses.text: And when he had spent all, there arose a mighty famine in that land; and he began to be in want.

verses.name: Luke 15:15
verses.text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine.

verses.name: Luke 15:16
verses.text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat: and no man gave unto him.
